name: Animal Adventure
description:
Synopsis

The player mistakenly entered a mythical world? The place where he was imprisoned countless demons and monsters. He wanted to go out, the people here told him to go out only one way. All he has to do is to enter the deepest part of the tower and release the big demon that is being held.

Key Features 

Story line: follow the player's footsteps and the NPCs encountered along the way to slowly gain a complete world view.

Chinese Mythology Background：Experience a different kind of mythology.

A world rendered with URP：Anime-like visual experience.

Easy-to-use operation：A simple keystroke is all it takes.

Game Genre：RPG/Adventure

Game Controls：Mouse and Keyboard

Platform：PC
